com.st.st25sdk

Interface SignatureInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ST25DV02KW1Tag, ST25DV02KW2Tag, ST25DVPwmTag, ST25TA02KBDTag, ST25TA02KBPTag, ST25TA02KBTag, ST25TA512BTag, ST25TVTag

    public interface SignatureInterface
    Defines all required methods to handle Electronic Signature

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte getKeyIdNDA()
      Indicate the Key Identifier (KID) corresponding to this tag.
      boolean isSignatureOkNDA(java.io.InputStream certificateInputStream)
      Function verifying the signature present in this tag
      byte[] readSignatureNDA()
      Function returning a byte array containing the electronic signature of this tag.

    • Method Detail

      • getKeyIdNDA

        byte getKeyIdNDA()
          throws STException
        Indicate the Key Identifier (KID) corresponding to this tag. This KeyId allows to choose the appropriate Certificate for Signature verification.
        Returns:
        1 byte KID value
        Throws:
        STException - IMPLEMENTED_IN_NDA_VERSION is thrown if the SDK doesn't contain Signature verification code. MISSING_LIBRARY is thrown if the BouncyCastle Libraries are not linked with the application.

      • isSignatureOkNDA

        boolean isSignatureOkNDA(java.io.InputStream certificateInputStream)
                  throws STException
        Function verifying the signature present in this tag
        Parameters:
        certificateInputStream - Certificate to be used for signature verification
        Returns:
        True if signature is OK.
        Throws:
        STException - IMPLEMENTED_IN_NDA_VERSION is thrown if the SDK doesn't contain Signature verification code. MISSING_LIBRARY is thrown if the BouncyCastle Libraries are not linked with the application.

      • readSignatureNDA

        byte[] readSignatureNDA()
                 throws STException
        Function returning a byte array containing the electronic signature of this tag.
        Returns:
        32-bit Electronic Signature data
        Throws:
        STException - IMPLEMENTED_IN_NDA_VERSION is thrown if the SDK doesn't contain Signature verification code. MISSING_LIBRARY is thrown if the BouncyCastle Libraries are not linked with the application.
